title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) - SocialBoost
subtitle: Learn how the SocialBoost platform using premium accounts with authentic history since 2009 increases the reach and visibility of your content on social media like X (Twitter), YouTube, and Web3. Discover the unique approach that sets SocialBoost apart from standard automation and bots, ensuring natural interactions and account security.

questions.question: What exactly is SocialBoost and how does it work?
questions.answer: SocialBoost is an advanced social media automation platform based on a network of premium accounts with authentic history dating back to 2009. The system strategically engages these accounts, interacting with your content, which significantly increases reach, visibility, and position in the algorithms of platforms like X (Twitter), YouTube, and Web3. Soon, in Q3 2025, Instagram will join. The key difference is the use of accounts with unique digital footprints and activity patterns, making interactions indistinguishable from organic actions of real users, unlike easily detectable bots.

questions.question: Which platforms does SocialBoost support?
questions.answer: We currently comprehensively support: X (Twitter) with over 3000 active accounts (12 years of history, 0% bans), YouTube with over 1500 accounts (authentic viewing histories, 90-100% video completion), and Web3 Platforms with over 3000 wallets and 150+ web3ID accounts. The Instagram solution will be available in Q3 2025. Each support is tailored to the specifics of the platform for maximum effectiveness and security.

questions.question: Why does SocialBoost work more effectively than other methods of increasing reach?
questions.answer: Our advantage stems from premium accounts with authentic history (from 2009-2022, natural networks), natural engagement patterns (unique style, individual activity), strategic strengthening of algorithmic signals (action at key moments of content evaluation), and advanced analytics. Internal research confirms a 200-500% more effective increase in reach compared to standard social media promotion methods.

questions.question: Is using SocialBoost safe for my accounts and brand?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely safe. We employ advanced activity masking: each account has a dedicated IP address and unique digital footprint. Our security effectiveness is 100% – no client account has ever experienced bans or restrictions. Interactions are perfectly matched to natural patterns (time, frequency, context), making them indistinguishable from organic engagement.

questions.question: How quickly will I see results using SocialBoost?
questions.answer: The first effects appear within 24-48 hours. Initial increase in reach and engagement is visible within 3-5 days. Significant results (growth in organic reach, followers, improved positioning) are typically seen after 14-21 days. Full optimization and maximum results after 30-45 days of consistent use.

questions.question: What specific results can I expect?
questions.answer: Based on client data, typical 30-day results include: 200-500% increase in reach, 150-300% increase in engagement, 30-100% growth in organic followers, 2-3x better algorithmic positioning results, and 40-120% increase in conversion from social media. Exact results depend on the niche, content quality, and initial level. 97.8% of clients achieve at least a 200% increase in reach in the first month.

questions.question: Does the engagement generated by SocialBoost look natural?
questions.answer: Yes, it's absolutely natural. Accounts generate authentic, contextual interactions that are impossible to distinguish from real users. Each account has a unique communication style, consistent activity patterns, contextually adequate comments, and diverse types of interactions. This engagement actually attracts additional organic reactions.

questions.question: How does the process of starting cooperation with SocialBoost look like?
questions.answer: The process is simple and takes under 15 minutes: Choose a plan, Basic configuration (public URLs/account names – no passwords), Define goals, Campaign setup by our team (up to 24h), Automatic system operation with monitoring in the analytical panel. First effects are usually visible after 1-2 business days of registration.

questions.question: Do I need to provide login data for my social media accounts?
questions.answer: No, SocialBoost does not require login data or access to your accounts. The system functions as a network of external users, engaging in natural interactions with publicly available content (commenting, sharing, interactions). You only need to provide public usernames or URLs.

questions.question: Can I direct SocialBoost activity to specific content?
questions.answer: Yes, you have full flexibility. Available models include: Automatic support for all new content, Prioritization of key content (you indicate posts/videos), Thematic campaigns (focus on hashtags/topics). Strategy and priorities can be adjusted in the management panel.

questions.question: How much time do I need to spend managing SocialBoost?
questions.answer: SocialBoost is a "set and forget" solution. After the initial configuration, the system operates automatically. Most clients spend less than 10 minutes a week reviewing reports and making occasional minor adjustments. Growth Pro and Enterprise plans include automatic strategic sessions with experts for further optimization.

questions.question: What pricing plans does SocialBoost offer?
questions.answer: We offer three monthly subscription plans with no long-term commitments: Starter (999/month): 500 accounts, 2 platforms, 50 interactions/day, basic analytics, email support. Growth Pro (2499/month) - Most Popular: 1500 accounts, all platforms, 200 interactions/day, advanced analytics/reports, priority support/strategic sessions. Enterprise (4999/month): 3000+ accounts, unlimited platforms, 500+ interactions/day, full KOL analysis, dedicated 24/7 support. Cancellation is possible at any time.

questions.question: Is there a long-term contract or commitment period?
questions.answer: No, we operate on a monthly subscription basis. You can cancel, change, or suspend the service at any time before the next billing cycle without fees. The philosophy is to retain clients through results (92% retention rate), not contracts.

questions.question: Do you offer a trial period or satisfaction guarantee?
questions.answer: Instead of a trial period, we offer a live demo. Additionally, all plans have a 14-day satisfaction guarantee: if within 2 weeks you don't notice at least a 50% increase in reach above normal, we'll refund 100% of the amount. You test without risk.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cards (Visa, Mastercard, AmEx), bank transfers (domestic/international), cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay. All transactions are secure (PCI DSS). Flexible terms are possible for Enterprise (quarterly/annual invoicing with discount).

questions.question: How exactly does SocialBoost work for the X (Twitter) platform?
questions.answer: We utilize 3000+ premium accounts with history dating back to 2009. The system monitors new posts, engages in the crucial first 15 minutes (X algorithm decision), generates a mix of interactions (comments, retweets, likes, saves), strengthens hashtags, and stimulates further organic reactions. The process leads to an average 300% increase in reach and 150-200% increase in followers monthly.

questions.question: How does SocialBoost improve YouTube results?
questions.answer: We focus on watch time and engagement. Accounts provide 90-100% video completion (key quality signal), generate valuable comments, strengthen engagement in the first 48h (crucial promotion decisions), optimize recommendations, and ensure natural growth dynamics. Clients note an average 200-400% increase in views, better positions, and accelerated subscriber growth.

questions.question: How does SocialBoost support for Web3 platforms work?
questions.answer: We utilize 3000+ authentic wallets and 150+ web3ID accounts. Support includes: Strategic discussions in communities (Discord, Telegram, mirrorxyz), authentic on-chain activity (transactions with your token/NFT), strengthening community signals, organic information distribution, and building an active environment attracting real participants. Projects note a 250-500% increase in visibility, 300% authentic interactions, and increased investor interest in the 1st month.

questions.question: When will the SocialBoost service for Instagram be available?
questions.answer: The Instagram solution will be officially available in Q3 2025, covering posts, Stories, Reels, IGTV with emphasis on natural engagement and security. You can join the waiting list for early beta access, 30% discount on 1st month, consultations with Instagram experts, and trend reports.

questions.question: Will SocialBoost replace my current social media strategy?
questions.answer: No, SocialBoost is a powerful supporting tool that multiplies the effects of your actions. The best results are achieved by combining SocialBoost with creating valuable content. We act as a catalyst, breaking the cold start barrier, strengthening algorithmic signals, increasing organic reach, attracting authentic engagement, and accelerating community growth. You focus on content, we ensure reach.

questions.question: Is using SocialBoost compliant with social media platform terms of service?
questions.answer: Yes, SocialBoost operates fundamentally differently than standard automation tools or bots. Our premium accounts engage as independent users, making their own decisions, respecting platform guidelines for natural interactions. We operate closer to PR/support groups, not as mass bots. This is confirmed by our 100% record of zero bans/restrictions for clients.

questions.question: For which industries and account types is SocialBoost most effective?
questions.answer: We deliver exceptional results for many industries and accounts. Best industry results: Fintech/Crypto (390% reach increase), Lifestyle/Travel (350% engagement increase), E-commerce (270% conversion increase), Education (320% follower increase), Gaming (410% views increase). Effective for: New projects, Established brands, Accounts with declining reach, Content creators, Businesses introducing new products. The system adapts the strategy to the niche.

questions.question: How can I monitor the results of SocialBoost actions?
questions.answer: Each plan includes an analytical panel with detailed insight into results: Reach growth metrics (percentage/numerical), Engagement analysis (types, quantity, quality), Conversion tracking, Intelligent comparisons (industry/competition), Forecasts/trends. Growth Pro/Enterprise plans offer advanced reports, export (PDF, CSV, API), and integration with GA/Tableau.

stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? Contact our support team for detailed information.
